short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily copy any page's HTML element to the clipboard with the press of a button or keyboard shortcut.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Button method:
1. Click the page
2. Click the extension icon
3. HTML is copied to clipboard

Keyboard shortcut method:

Quick, simple, and easy!
